Package de.hshannover.dqgui.execution

Interface DSLService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DSLFileService, JdbcDslService
    public interface DSLService
    DSLService is a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) interface for the DQGUI application.
    It can be implemented for various repository data sources.

    The interface should fail hard and quick. Thus all operations should rethrow checked exceptions as DSLServiceException so someone higher up the chain can deal with them.

    It also features methods to move a component and discover all existing valid components within the repository and can detect if it is malformed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  DSLService.RepositoryStatus
      Reports the status of the set repository (does it exist, is it malformed?)
